snippet: “El Pasado Es un Animal Grotesco” (“The Past Is a Grotesque Animal”) by the Argentine writer Mariano Pensotti delves into the fictions of our pasts.
abstract: Rachel Saltz reviews production of El Pasado Es un Animal Grotesco, written and directed by Mariano Pensotti, presented by the Public Theater’s Under the Radar festival and Performance Space 122’s Coil festival.
lead_paragraph: “El Pasado Es un Animal Grotesco” (“The Past Is a Grotesque Animal”) by the Argentine writer Mariano Pensotti delves into the fictions of our pasts.

headline.seo: ‘El Pasado Es un Animal Grotesco’ at the Public Theater
headline.main: That Revolving Drama in Which All Are Actors
headline.print_headline: That Revolving Drama In Which All Are Actors
headline.content_kicker: Theater Review | 'The Past Is a Grotesque Animal'
headline.kicker: Theater Review | 'The Past Is a Grotesque Animal'
